name: Scrollbar
description: The `Scrollbar` class is a custom UI widget that provides vertical scrolling functionality for JSMacros custom screens and interfaces. It offers smooth scrolling mechanics with customizable appearance, range configuration, and event handling for scroll position changes.
overview:
The `Scrollbar` class provides comprehensive scrolling functionality:

- **Dynamic Range Configuration**: Supports custom scroll ranges with automatic thumb sizing
- **Visual Customization**: Customizable colors for the thumb, background, and hover states
- **Interactive Controls**: Click-to-position and drag-to-scroll functionality
- **Event Handling**: Callback system for scroll position changes with proper value calculation
- **Auto-Visibility**: Automatically hides when content fits within view
- **Smooth Scrolling**: Natural scrolling behavior with proper position calculation

constructors.signature: new Scrollbar(x, y, width, height, color, borderColor, highlightColor, scrollPages, onChange)
constructors.description: Creates a new Scrollbar with specified position, size, colors, scroll range, and change callback.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X position of the scrollbar on the screen

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y position of the scrollbar on the screen

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Background color of the scrollbar track

parameters.name: highlightColor
parameters.description: Color of the scrollbar thumb (draggable part)

parameters.name: scrollPages
parameters.description: Total number of scroll pages/content units

parameters.name: onChange
parameters.description: Callback function triggered on scroll position changes

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Updates the position and dimensions of the scrollbar, recalculating scroll distances and maintaining relative scroll position.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: New X position of the scrollbar

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: New Y position of the scrollbar

examples:
// Reposition the scrollbar when the screen resizes
scrollbar.setPos(180, 20, 10, 120);

methods.name: setScrollPages
methods.description: Updates the total number of scrollable pages or content units, automatically adjusting thumb size and visibility. If scrollPages < 1, the scrollbar becomes inactive and hidden.

parameters.name: scrollPages
parameters.description: Total number of scroll pages/content units

methods.name: scrollToPercent
methods.description: Scrolls to a specific percentage of the total scroll range.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Internal method that triggers the change callback with the current scroll position calculated as a percentage of the total scrollable range. This method is called automatically by other scrollbar methods and user interactions.
